alert.note: Alert for Frio; Medina (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:23PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Medina and north central Frio Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 423 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Moore, or 10 miles north of Pearsall, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pearsall, North Pearsall, Moore, Yancey, Biry and Three Oaks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
